brad.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small metal object like a button with two metal sticks that are put through several pieces of paper and folded down to hold the papers together
brad.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a small thin wire nail with either a small head or a part that sticks out to the side instead of a head
brad.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: abbreviation for British Rate and Data
